content.rendered:
Cosmopolitan
Club

ABOUT

The Cosmopolitan Club was established in 1895 by Sardar M Kantharaje Urs, the then Dewan of the erstwhile Kingdom of Mysore who bestowed prime land of over 4 acres. It was a time when the Mysore kingdom was under the suzerainty of the British who started the Club culture mainly for the relaxation of their officers and their families.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Brand Identity
  • Brand Communication

INDUSTRY

Clubs & Events - B2C

CHALLENGES

Organic
 & Eye-Catching

01

Showcasing a legacy of 125 years.

02

Interviewing stakeholders and figuring out exactly what they wanted.

03

Choosing a colour palette that defined the rich legacy of the club.

04

Creating a logo that was compact and usable everywhere and that can carry the club’s identity for years to come.

SOLUTION

Iconic Emblem
 for An Iconic Club

To celebrate the 125th anniversary of the Cosmopolitan club, we crafted a royal identity that was derived from the existing emblem but had a more iconic feel to it.

For The Royals

IDENTITY

The icon is derived from the existing emblem with a royal colour palette and gold font base which gives a feel of regality and royalty giving the club a well deserved iconic identity.

IMPACT

A Place For Kings

The branding we did for the cosmopolitan club was scaled everywhere and the members of the community really appreciated the new look and feel of the club.
